author: George Kappeler
description: Spicy rye whiskey delicately sweetened and given an orange accent by a splash of triple sec and heightened with a couple of dashes of bitters. This is a cocktail that benefits from dilution, hence our addition of water, and arguably works better on-the-rocks rather than straight-up.
name: The Holland House (Kappeler's rye-based)
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
15 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
